text: tai laga bhal kaam laga naam nimite jani thaka ekjon ase; jodi tai bacha khan ke bhal pora palikena sa jon ase, nachina manu khan ke bhal pora saise, tai pobitro manu khan laga theng dhulaise, tai dukh pa khan ke aram dise, aru tai sob bhal kaam khan korise, eneka hoile tai laga naam likhibi.
